website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option and a good choice for consumers who want skin-clarifying results and numerous strips. They are also hypoallergenic, which makes them suitable for sensitive skin.
pros: Cleans deep without being too harsh on sensitive skin
Strips contain witch hazel and work in 15 minutes
cons: Some may find the scent slightly unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: They work really well
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to show an after picture of the strip but these work well. When you wet your skin and stick one on your nose it really sticks. I don’t even find it necessary to wait the 10-15 minutes for it to dry and be effective. I like how the strips are cut strategically to help you contour them to your nose. The price of them is great compared to name brand and work just as well if not better. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Dutty skin?
customer_reviews.text: Got alot of gunk even after I "thoroughly cleaned" or so i thought. The adhesive can be better but I just held pressure, no biggie
customer_reviews.author: J. Al Ford

customer_reviews.title: No Effect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on the reviews. Ultimately disappointed, as they did absolutely nothing. Update Dec 1, 2019: This merchant has repeatedly contacted me by email to offer $15 for me to delete my unfavorable review. That's bribery. Needless to say, I did not accept the merchant's offer, which was heavily weighted toward guilting me into submission. The merchant also claims the product has been reformulated and now works more effectively. That may be, so buy at your own risk. I stand by my original assessment - the product I received had no effect on me.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D Citrin

customer_reviews.title: Main ingredient super glue???
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this because of all the good reviews. When I 1st applied to my nose I couldn't really figure out what the strong smell was but then I realized it smelled a whole lot like super glue. I tried to iver look the smell but then when I pulled the strip off it took off some of my skin around my nose also. Bottom line, yes it will get blackheads but it may also rip your skin off too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Ripped my skin off
customer_reviews.text: I left it on for the directed time and when I pulled it off, it ripped a huge chunk of my skin off and my face was bleeding bad. It’s been 4 days and I still have a huge scab. Edit: This company has been continuously trying to get me to remove my bad review for a gift card to their store. After looking through at the other reviews I’ve seen that I’m not the only one who got their skin ripped off. Very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Biore pore strips in the past, but this brand is much better. I’m impressed with the design. Because of the notches, these adhere much better and allow it to mold perfectly to your nose. Since they adhere better, they seem to pull out more impurities than other brands. I especially like the price and that I get more strips that the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as the Biore strips
customer_reviews.text: I have always used the pore strips from Biore and I have to say this set works just as good if not better. The packaging is pleasing and professional. To use the strips, you need to wet the nose area and then apply the glue side over it. I waited for 15 minutes for it to dry out and the results was great. A lot of blackheads came out as you can see in the picture so it was super effective. Overall, I would recommend this set for its adhesion strength.
customer_reviews.author: Huang's Family

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Liner Stuck
customer_reviews.text: Had to toss out entire pack, the liner was stuck to all the strips and would not come off. When I ripped it out of frustration, the plastic liner and strip were still stuck together.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: unpleasant product smell
customer_reviews.text: Not like the ones sold in US that I buy at any drugstore or supermarket. Maybe they were just old? Strips came very stiff. Doesn’t stick with a cleaned wet face. Used a lot of water to get it to stick. It will stick and get the job done. It’s mainly the smell of the strips I can’t deal with, it’s very unpleasant. When applied to nose, I breathed through my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I normally use the popular brand of these but omg. These are so much better. I used the other brand two days ago and used one of these today. So much better. I never had a ton of ance or blackheads as a teenager but now I have blackheads where my cheeks meet my nose. The other strips haven't done much to alleviate them but just using these one time, I got rid of half of them! I didn't even keep it on for 15 minutes, left it for about 7. Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: MJDRCC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These deep cleansing pore strips are easy to use. No smell. Stretchy enough to fit most noses. They do a great job cleaning the pores and removing white heads and blackheads. The nose feels much softer, smoother and cleaner after one use. Pore size was visibly reduced after the first use with the deep cleansing pore strips. You leave the strip on for 15 minutes and then remove to a much cleaner nose. I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, better than the boire strips. It gets so much nasty hunk out. But... the smell gives me migraines everytime I use them. It is hard to get through the 15 minutes and even afterwards I am left with my head hurting. Kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Super duper - maybe too super?! (For me anyway)
customer_reviews.text: Youch! Tried to save a few bucks with this brand vs my normal strips and was not a fan. To clarify- they really do work to get rid of blackheads and dirt, but maybe a bit too well?! They caused my skin to peel after each use, so I went back to my usual brand. I used maybe 4 and three the rest out. If you have really thick skin, these would be good for you - but otherwise: be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a must try 😊
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this product, he tried some other blackhead pore strip before and they did not work. But this one is different it’s stays in place and took almost 98% blackheads on his nose. He loves the cucumber smell and doesn’t give you a sticky icky feel. Definitely a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Glory Ann Ziniti

customer_reviews.title: does not leave a residue feeling
customer_reviews.text: i like that the pore strips do not leave a residue after using like other products that i have tried. they are easy to use. just get your nose wet and apply the strip and it will secure itself. i noticed that alot of the blackheads were removed on the first time i used the pore strips.
customer_reviews.author: Amber massin

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son. Easy to put on but does not work well. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Got Open box. Missing 2 stripes. Still I tried, not as good as other brands. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: m j

customer_reviews.title: For both men and women
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out a lot of junk! Glad I have these now. Going to use these only twice a month but that should be enough for proper personal maintenance. Just make sure to leave them on for the required time :)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chavana

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Biore but still work
customer_reviews.text: These are stiff and sometimes not even attached to the plastic when I cut open the individual package. They seem to work decently, but nothing compares to the Biore strips - which are soft and bendable at first, but then stiffen up. These are already stiff. Wouldn’t buy again but for the cost, you get a lot of them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, but they still got the job done. They just don’t stick as well as the other leading brands. One thing I did like was that the instructions on the box were “easier” than other boxes. Very simple yet to the point.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Removes blackheads well
customer_reviews.text: These blackhead pore strips work great! They really remove a lot of my blackheads, and I can see it on the strip when I remove it. They stick well, are easy to apply, and come with a great quantity for the price. I've found my new pore strip and am absolutely satisfied with them!
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Really sticky
customer_reviews.text: Product does remove your Whiteheads but it’s so sticky that it’s hard to peel off and also peel off bits of skin on my nose . My nose started to burn afterwards since skin is peeled. I also had seasonal allergies the week I used it and blow my nose a lot so could be sensitive which made my skin easier to peel .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday. My Partner and I used it last night. Amazing, took all the white heads. I recommend this product. 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: jessa amor

customer_reviews.title: No adverse effects
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She used a few times. We arent convinced it worked. But did not have any adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These pore strips worked really well! And for the amount of strips you get for the price is a really good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Doody

customer_reviews.title: Sticks really well, great poor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these strips. They adhere to the skin well and are great at pulling out all the gross pore junk! I prefer to lay a hot washcloth on my nose to open my pores prior to using strips as it really helps them to adhere to the blackhead. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: A.Lichtenstein

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are garbage. The box came open to start. Each one is individually sealed which 6ou would think would be good but every single one is dried out and won't even stick to your nose. COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY!!!! Not one worked out if the whole package!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very good. I recommend it to you
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for something so important to your face care weekly routine. I washed and applied it and in 15 minutes peeled off. Super cute way and it pulls everything out of the pores. 95% came out. I'm sure when I repeat this in 2 days the few tiny spots will come out as well. Happy with this purchase and highly recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cannon

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: not sure why ppl are saying they don’t work. they do - i can see junk after using them. i don’t think they’re as good as the charcoal ones i buy in the store but they’re good. they do work and u get wayyyyyy more.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These products work wonderfully, and they actually make blackheads that you can't get out normally. It's easy to just forget about them for a moment and come back and you have a very clean nose. For this price it's a recommendation and they work very well so I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: William Conner

customer_reviews.title: Clear Pores
customer_reviews.text: For clear pores and getting rid of blackheads try this product. It takes about 10-15 minutes to dry and feels like paper mache when dry, but works pretty well. Despite using acne reducing facial soap I still felt anxious about the small blemishes on my nose, plus I was skeptical about pore strips. it seemed very effective since it pulled out the blackheads and gunks from my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy d Burke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: You get so many for the value and these work so much better then store bought ones I use to get! Last long too making my skin amazing
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Plentiful and relatively painless.
customer_reviews.text: I've used other strips with some success. These strips seemed to do a better job at removing blackheads when compared to other products. I let the strip dry completely and it came with the normal amount of pain that you expect from a nose strip. There's quite a few strips in a box so I'll be good for a while, but I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Will be getting more! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today and already can tell a difference so good I will be getting more thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: They are really good. It sticks really well and gets everything out. Not sure if that's good for your skin, but that's another topic :)
customer_reviews.author: Reda

customer_reviews.title: Not used yet!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product, but I was missing 6 strips. Make sure you count your strips. I will be returning product and receiving a replacement. Will Update review.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo A.

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of sebum and blackheads. Also removes your skin! It peeled off large chunks of skin from my nose. Now I'm bleeding and in pain. I hope this doesn't leave me with scars.
customer_reviews.author: Sycamore

customer_reviews.title: Best cleansing product
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample from this product and I love how it works. I really would recommend it . I'm usually careful with what I put in my face since I have sensitive skin. Even the smallest thing makes me get irritated and this product didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Product works.
customer_reviews.text: I used them according to directions and they did the job that was intended. Great value and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: judy l. smith

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It's the second time I'm buying this. Price is good and it works. I can see a lot of blackheads after every use. It'll stick onto your nose as long as you wet it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Javin

customer_reviews.title: Effective with Minimal Pain
customer_reviews.text: This are great strips to remove unwanted blackheads with minimal pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sohussaini

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as the biore ones ): Smells weird like chemicals. Doesn’t stick very well. Didn’t seem to do much
customer_reviews.author: sarah smith

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: It got very slimy and really sticky when I over wet it. Doesnt compare to biore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like getting a facial
customer_reviews.text: These are abasing! A great Dupe fit other high end strips you find at Sephora. They also don’t leave any residue
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that is straight-up do what it suppose to do. Great value, simple packaging. The strip actually came in a plain no print bag and the strips are not scented. I would definitely order again in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bayuseta

customer_reviews.title: The health of my sons skin
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Use it to clean the black heads around my nose
customer_reviews.text: This is the best black nose patch I've ever used. It doesn't smell or irritate my skin. I use it to clean my mites and remove blackheads
customer_reviews.author: bauguss

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The goods have been received and will be mail soon.The effect of many products I have used is not so ideal.This product is outstanding,especially mild and has a nice smell.It will not be pungent if it is light.Personal recommendation can buy.
customer_reviews.author: LPtgfvb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These things are so much better than any brand I’ve bought in stores. And the amount for the price is even better. They work amazingly on my nose and the pictures posted are actually from my chin. Definitely recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use , worked really good , money's worth, my nose looks better and feels super soft. Will be buying again for sure ! I have super sensitive skin so I can't really use most nose strips but these didn't bother me at all a little swelling but nothing too crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products to get rid of black head and none of them have worked as good as this has
customer_reviews.author: danielle todd

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying experience
customer_reviews.text: Definitely satisfying experience. Seeing the strip after removal looked a little like a hedgehogs back. Arrived on time and as advertised so that was a win.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Best Results Yet!
customer_reviews.text: This product works much better than allll of the other competitors..I’ve tried them. Definitely my new go-to option.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Boos

customer_reviews.title: does what suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: i'm happy with the purchase so far leave my nose clean. I will buy it again. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cristiano Mergozzi

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to find better. Tried about 12 different brands over the years because my nose blackheads are so consistent and persistent. And this one are the best! Use these on my nose as well.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Decent strips
customer_reviews.text: These strips do the job but I wish they were a little more sticky and didnt smell so bad! Either way they get the job done for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: K-Amzn-2

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this product! I was skeptical because I have combination skin. I tried it and absolutely loved it! My pores really did look better so of course I bought more and my skin just keeps getting better and better!
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It works as the other costly brand..but the only thing which bothers me is the strong weird smell
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product but it takes some things off
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Clean pores
customer_reviews.text: Im obsessed with my blackheads. Super Gross!!! These strips thoroughly cleansed my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, cleans the pores well with the first application, I liked
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Cassim

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is really nice! Worth a money! Black head are completely removed after 2 settings.
customer_reviews.author: Akshata

customer_reviews.title: Really does remove your blackheads!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing leave on until pad is fully dry and than remove slowly and you’ll definitely see black/ white heads removed
customer_reviews.author: sheyla gomez lessiur

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Just pony up for Biore, these remove your skin and get few black heads
customer_reviews.author: Mr Neville Prevett

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly well, and arrived in a timely manner. Cute thank you card included. Will buy again and recommend. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Pulled my skin off.
customer_reviews.text: Left product on for specified amount of time and it pulled my skin off. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those hard to get rid of black heads.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D.

customer_reviews.title: empty bag
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing in my package received an empty bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: ok so I opened one packet and it was empty. I kept using them though and they are great. Just as good as the expensive grocery store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have blackhead pore strips!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best blackhead removal strips I have ever used. It will take out all your blackheads out from your pores and make your skin look cleaner and brighter. Highly recommended..!!
customer_reviews.author: Renu Palkar

customer_reviews.title: Really, Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical because I have bought so many products that are meant to remove blackheads and they never work. These strips work extremely well. You get the best presults when you leave the strip on for the full 20 minutes. The strip adheres well, so I make sure the entire strip is fully touching my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Better design that Biore, actually adapts well to nose for better pick-up, but the adhesive is not as good as Biore strips, so that was disappointing. The adhesion feels like just a 3X stronger version of masking tape. Doesn't pick up as much as Biore strips, which get in to the pores more. Also, they take a little longer for the water to get absorbed and soften the stiff strip's adhesive side, which was already off the plastic film when I opened the envelope, so I was afraid they were expired. But it eventually adapts just fine to the skin. Works just OK, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R

customer_reviews.title: Works well !
customer_reviews.text: The strips are really easy way to clean your face and get rid of all the blackheads and gunk that are in your pores. When I like about this it’s not a messy project and doesn’t get that black mud all over you The strips are easy to use and they really work. Your face feels clean and soft when you take them off. They stick really well and I think this is a really good value
customer_reviews.author: SLTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Smells like super glue. Not entirely convinced it isn't.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this smelled like super glue to me. It felt really, really cold after a few minutes and only intensified. Took forever to dry as it was super gooey. As someone who uses a lot of beauty products, I can say this is hands down the worst pore strip I've used. Also from other reviews I see some people got different packaging. This was the one in the listing with the woman on the front and the holographic detail, not the one I've seen in some reviews with white packaging and pinkish red flowers. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great Value-Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the positive reviews and the value is unbeatable for the amount of strips you get. I used one tonight after I showered. It was very easy to apply and didn’t leave weird gaps on the sides of my nose like some pore strips I’ve used before. There is a strong scent of chemical/plastic or something unpleasant when you first apply it but it goes away after about a minute or so. It dries fast too, which is great. I use pore strips about 1-2 a week, so I’m very happy with these so far!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Audrey

customer_reviews.title: A complexion game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Having oily skin, getting blackheads often on my skin is a daily occurrence. I bought these to help extract the blackheads deep in the pores of my nose. These strips work great. All you have to do is wet your nose, peel off the backing of the strip and apply it on your nose. After about 10 minutes, just peel it gently off your nose...and your blackheads come off with it! Now the pores on my nose appear smaller, thanks to these handy strips. A complexion game changer for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Used to buy the biore strips, tried a few other random brands that never worked as well. Thought I'd give this brand a shot since the price was so much better. Works just as well as the biore strips! Felt a little stiffer than I'm used to but just as effective. And you get way more bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work, quite bummed out
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Followed directions exactly as instructed on box, waited 15 minutes, and saw absolutely no difference. So, decided to try one more time, and again no results. ..but i am happy that amazon has a wonderful return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Search Party

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty effective and good on price
customer_reviews.text: I have used Biore before, Which were pretty expensive. Back in the day, you would have to pay $10 for just a single strip. This one is very cheap in terms of price, but works almost as well. It’s easy to use, and very effective. We need to do, is wash your face, with your nose, chin, and apply the patch. Wait for about five minutes, take it off. Most of the blackheads are gone. Are usually follow up with a solution of chamomile tea to make the pores smaller. Something I learned from my sister. My verdict: It’s very good for pulling out the blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Vasiliy Babko

customer_reviews.title: Virutec Computer Repair Approved.
customer_reviews.text: I run a small computer repair store and only leave reviews on the things I feel meet expectations. I am giving this item a 5 star because It works great with no problems. We probably spend over $50,000 a year on Amazon for our business, so finding the right parts in a timely matter at an affordable price so I can make some profit is key. We rely on Amazon to keep us in stock with parts.
customer_reviews.author: Virutec Computer Repair

customer_reviews.title: YES! Finally
customer_reviews.text: Oh. my. gosh. I thought I was going to go my whole life without knowing how good a pore strip could really be. These are so good at pulling out my whiteheads and clogged pores!!! They stick really well, which has been a complaint of mine with past strips. Super easy and standard application like most, and you only need 20 minutes. These are so good. Definitely will repurchase when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: VivalaDittrich

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: first of all, this is a bargain price for 24 pcs at $8. the strips are packed individually. make sure you read the instruction well. you need to wet your nose with warm water then apply the strips. blackheads and whiteheads come off even from the first use. works well. i have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Biore
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Biore nose strips for awhile. I found these to be cheaper with more strips. Overall, they work just exactly the same as Biore for 3/4th of the price. But the strips are slightly thicker. I don't know if that effects anything tho. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzan

customer_reviews.title: Strong suckers!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about a month and each time have been happy with what they pull out. While I haven't seen a decrease in my pore size, due to inconsistent useage, I can tell when I keep up on skin care they have done their hardest!
customer_reviews.author: Noyam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are fantastic! They were so well! It's so satisfying. Such a great value for the money. The only thing (which is still a testament to the product) is don't leave it on too long or you will RIP the skin off! 10-15 minutes only!
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These nose strips work great. I had washed my face and thought it was really clean. I did not think much would come off, but wow, yuck! I have used these a couple of times and I have found the wetter the skin the better it seems to work. Skin feels smooth and a little tighter. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmbilletTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Gets half of the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They only pull off about half of my blackheads. I always exfoliate beforehand and let dry for 20-25mins. I've also tried pulling strip off upward and downward with same results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removes impurities
customer_reviews.text: These work really well- they’re fun and satisfying to use! I didn’t realize how bad I needed these until I actually used one. I like that it’s a 24-pack, so it’ll last me awhile. They are anti-bacterial and hypoallergenic and have worked nicely on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but for some reason I never see any results. Even after strictly following the instructions 5 different times, the results were nothing, yet I can see clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: excellent pore strips
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by these pore strips. They provide a deep clean for my pores at an affordable price. I highly recommend them. I also find these to be non-irritating to my sensitive skin.m
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: They smell terrible!
customer_reviews.text: These work well enough but whatever the adhesion is made of smells terrible, like the worst kind of Elmer's glue or something. These are a great price but it will have been a one-time purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny2127

customer_reviews.title: Superglue?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong this the packaging or presentation but the actual strips smells so terrible you’d think the adhesive was made of superglue like e6000. Very painful to take off and I only got mediocre results. I’m planning on returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Si Lin Lei

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick well
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion is not as good as the other famous brand. The strip peeled off from the backing too easy and it was dry as well, wetting the pore strip makes it tear too easy. I will stick with the original famous brand. Have tried several brands, but nothing comes close to the original. Will not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Claire N

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something that worked better than the biore strips and these are it.
customer_reviews.author: sbrack97058

customer_reviews.title: Duct tape would work better.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This is cheap masking tape shaped like a nose. Does absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Koch

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biore
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying Biore for years, but decided to give these a try for my son. Way better, just peel them off very slowly as they stick really well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These works amazing. I would highly recommend this to anyone. The Price was really affordable. I love the way my skin feels afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Trinna

customer_reviews.title: ewww
customer_reviews.text: They work and didn't hurt to pull off like some name brand ones
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: These strip really works
customer_reviews.text: These really worked!!! My husband and I used them and my husband's strip was very gross. Definitely took off alot of black heads.
customer_reviews.author: SUZY

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: These strips work wonderfully and very quickly. They didn’t make me break out. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: bill bourgeois

product_meta.title: Blackhead Remover Pore Strips For Men, Deep Cleansing Strips, 29 Strips, With Charcoal and Oil Free Peel Off Strips
feature_bullets: 🌿【Designed for men】It is more absorbent than ordinary pore strips, larger volume. Apply to the nose and other parts of the face.

🌿【Fast and effective】The pore strips deeply cleanse with a cool tingle to scrub away impurities, and contain salicylic acid acne treatment that penetrates into pores to leave skin feeling soft, smooth, and fresh
🌿【Shrink pores】With continual use, you can help reduce the appearance of blackheads and see a visible reduction in the size of your pores
🌿【Mild, not stimulating】Ideal for acne-prone skin and gentle enough for sensitive skin, this pore strip gently exfoliates pore-clogging oil and dirt without stripping your skin
🌿【100% MONEY BACK GUARANTY】90 days money back guaranty!! No extra requirement. 12 month quality warranty and replace new one.
